<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hag's Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=1328) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 31 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've nurtured the supernatural abilities gifted by your hag mother, particularly your sight. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
name: Hag's Sight
